events.name: Clean and Green Hackathon
events.about:
Clean and Green Hackathon

The hackathon will consist of developers coming together and through key environmental datasets, collaboratively co-create solutions using mobile/web applications that will empower the public to play a more active role in safeguarding, nurturing and cherishing Singapores environment. The hackathon will follow two topics: Safeguard our clean and green environment and Conserve our precious resources, aligned with the Clean and Green campaign in 2013.

It will be held from 24-25 November 2012, at the Plug-In@Blk71, an innovative space amanged by NUS Enterprise. All meals will be provided from start till end and winners of the hackathon stand to win attractive prizes.

This event is geared to forming a lasting relationship with the creative community in Singapore and encouraging innovation and citizen collaboration for a more environmentally conscious and technologically enabled Singapore citizenry.

Registration

Registration is free and open

Transportation

MRT Station: One-North, Kent Ridge

Bus: 14, 33, 91, 92, 95, 166, 198, 200

Sponsors

Adobe

National University of Singapore

More Information

Please see www.cgs.sg/hackathon
